changes.change: Reworked release spotlighting (some releases will prompt a modal once, most won't).
Thumbnails for Theater of Pain and De Other Side will no longer sometimes render just an empty map.
Route thumbnail generation scheduling logic reworked to be more simple, perform better and prioritize routes differently to make a bit more sense.
Pulls sidebar now also features an option to hide it instead of just on mobile. The map view's header looks better various smaller resolutions.
Mobile view of Discovery page now show subcreation ease tiers in 'current week' and 'next week'.
Temporary routes can now once again be claimed to your profile once you're logged in.
Various light theme bugfixes related to colors (white text on white background for example) and placements of elements.
